args.channel-prompt: [W|w]hat channel would you like to snoop on?

split.description: Sends split messages with a specific total length
split.details: This command is for testing split messages. The length must be at least 1.

args.length-prompt: [H|h]ow many characters long would you like the message to be?

args.member-prompt: [W|w]hat user would you like to snoop on?
